mapper.select: select * from place where place_addr like #{place_addr} and place_name like #{place_name}
select * from place where place_id like #{place_id}

SELECT p.place_id,t.time_val,t.time_id,t.res_time FROM place p JOIN (select pt.time_val, pt.place_id,r.time_id,r.res_time from place_time pt left join reservation r on pt.time_id=r.time_id and r.res_time=#{res_time} ) t ON p.place_id = t.place_id where p.place_id=#{place_id} order BY t.time_val;
